news.title: Robinhood Q4 earnings miss as crypto revenues decline
news.titleOriginal: Robinhood Q4 earnings miss as crypto revenues decline
news.summary: Robinhood shares fell nearly 8% in after-hours trading as the platform’s record Q4 revenues weren’t enough to satisfy analysts’ predictions.

news.title: Crypto miner Canaan sinks 7% despite strongest quarter in 3 years
news.titleOriginal: Crypto miner Canaan sinks 7% despite strongest quarter in 3 years
news.summary: Canaan’s fall on Tuesday sent its share price to $0.56, falling further from the $1 it must reclaim by July to avoid a potential Nasdaq delisting.
